Music Globe

WebGL Data wrangling Bandsintown API

This is a visualization of artists events locations on a 3D globe.

Search for an artist or a band to see where they've been. Bar height and color are relative per artist: the more often an event happened at a place, the higher the bar is.
Both past and upcoming events are displayed.

Artists suggestions are fetched from MusicBrainz and events from Bandsintown, so the artist choice could be limited. Bandsintown is also pretty recent (founded in 2007), "old artists" won't show up in the search.

  • Demo
    http://jtuloup.github.io/music-globe
  • Source code
    https://github.com/jtuloup/music-globe
  • Video of my presentation at Demo Dag Malm√∂
    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZjFKV0fyIgU

Ant Colony Optimization - TSP

Algorithms Simulation Visualization

A visualization for the Traveling Salesman Problem

Playing around with ant colony to solve the TSP.
Graphics make it more fun to visualize.

  • Demo
    http://jtuloup.github.io/aco-tsp/
  • Source code
    https://github.com/jtuloup/aco-tsp

Rebirth - JS1K competition

Javascript 1KB Canvas

Rebirth is my javascript demo for the JS1K Spring 2013 competition.

The theme was Spring , and got the inspiration from the Swedish early spring / end of winter.
It was made in Javascript, using the canvas API for drawing, and with quite a few aweful Javascript tricks to make it all fit in 1024 bytes :)

Trees are generated procedurally, so if you want new ones, just refresh the page.

  • Demo
    http://js1k.com/2013-spring/demo/1344
  • Source code
    https://github.com/jtuloup/Rebirth

Gtomee

Games Android

Gtomee is an indie game studio that we created with Thibaut Patel, while we were studying at the university.
Our two games are targeted for Android, with the idea of reaching as many players as possible. These games were entirely made during our free time.

More information on our website!
